title: Science Teacher Education Design through VR-Based Reflective Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Science subject matter expertise and foundational classroom management experience
context.additional_context: Enhancing pedagogical competencies through reflective thinking training in VR simulations for science professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can observe and analytically evaluate at least three major teaching-learning methods in science classes within a VR simulation environment.
Learners can write reflective journals on their own teaching behaviors at least twice a week through VR-based lesson simulations.
Learners can derive at least three improvement plans based on VR lesson observation results through collaborative feedback sessions with peers.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
